channel.title: Changing icon for rank
channel.description: Ok so for both playerrights 2 && 3 it has the admin icon im not sure where i change this...

item.title: Changing icon for rank
item.dc:creator: @Mattiaspope Mattiaspope
item.description:
@Mattiaspope wrote:

I’ve changed the modicons in cache but it still comes up with admin for player rights 3 when it should be the owner icon, if i type <img=3> into chat it comes up with the owner icon. i dont know what to look for in client.java to change it.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing icon for rank
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Depends on the client. Most PI Clients have it so that its loads from the cache Sprites/Player/MODICON #, and then some have them cache packed in which you need Toms Suite and simple cache knowledge to add and remove along with a few client.java editing. As I assume you are using PI, thats all i know. If its delta, im mindfucked.

Read full topic
